thread.title: What You Need To Do To Be Successful In 2017 (In 5 Words), Based On Your Zodiac Sign
thread.title_full: What You Need To Do To Be Successful In 2017 (In 5 Words), Based On Your Zodiac Sign

author: Kim Quindlen
title: What You Need To Do To Be Successful In 2017 (In 5 Words), Based On Your Zodiac Sign
text:
unsplash.com Aries (March 21st to April 19th) Fully commit to your decisions.
Taurus (April 20th to May 21st) Don’t try to control others.
Gemini (May 22nd to June 21st) Be okay asking for help.
Cancer (June 22nd to July 22nd) Accept that change is necessary.
Leo (July 23rd to August 22nd) Be more willing to listen.
Virgo (August 23rd to September 22nd) Accept that perfection is impossible.
Libra (September 23rd to October 22nd) Pay attention to your gut.
Scorpio (October 23rd to November 22nd) Be flexible with others’ ideas.
Sagittarius (November 23rd to December 21st) Trust your own instincts more.
Capricorn (December 22nd to January 20th) Have more faith in yourself.
Aquarius (January 21st to February 18th) Be okay with huge goals.
Pisces (February 19th to March 20th) Stick to your beliefs resolutely.
